title: Unspecified Rads Error
body:
pls help

(   USER)[09:41:47.003] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Riot Application Distribution System (c) 2010 Riot Games (version 1.0.0.228)
(   USER)[09:41:47.003] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Running at 09:41:47 on 10/03/2017
(WARNING)[09:41:47.003] RADS::Common::CiderUser32::CiderUser32: Failed to load TGIsFullscreen, CiderUser32 not running 
(WARNING)[09:41:47.003] RADS::Common::CiderUser32::Create: Failed to startup CiderUser32, not on a Mac
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.003] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Command line: "updateandrun lol_launcher LoLLauncher.exe"
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.003] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Executed from root folder with correct name, not an update.
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.003] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::HTTPConnection: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.003] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Connect: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.003] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: ("/releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe.version", "D:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp\TMP44B8.tmp", RETRY, 0x00000000)
(  ERROR)[09:41:47.190] RADS::UserKernel::`anonymous-namespace'::ParseVersionFile: Invalid version.
(  ERROR)[09:41:47.190] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Failed parse the downloaded version file.
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.190] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Disconnect: ()
(  ERROR)[09:41:47.190] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: SelfUpdate failed.
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.191] RADS::User::ManagedFileHelper::Release: 
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.191] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Returning 0x80004005
(  DEBUG)[09:41:47.192] RADS::Common::ErrorMessageMap::ErrorMessageMap: locale: en_us
(   USER)[09:41:47.192] WinMain: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

replies.body: Your settings or antivirus might be getting in the way of your game files being accessed.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help get that fixed!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NoTteYvf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-03T17:22:42.780+0000)
>
> Your settings or antivirus might be getting in the way of your game files being accessed.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help get that fixed!

Sadly, the only option I haven't tried there is the reinstallation of League, but I can't really try that as I have a slow connection. Are there any other solutions?

A reinstall might not work if your security settings are still getting in the way.  In this case download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs.  Attach them to a ticket, and our tech team will work with you on this.
